org.mindroid.impl.robot

Class DifferentialPilot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mindroid.impl.robot.DifferentialPilot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDifferentialPilot

    public class DifferentialPilot
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDifferentialPilot
    The Differential pilot is used to execute synchronized motor operations and precise robot drive control.

      • DifferentialPilot

        public DifferentialPilot(MotorProvider motorProvider,
                         EV3PortID leftMotor,
                         EV3PortID rightMotor,
                         float wheelDiameter,
                         float trackWidth)
        Parameters:
        motorProvider - motorprovider to access synced motor group
        leftMotor - port of left motor
        rightMotor - port of right motor
        wheelDiameter - in cm
        trackWidth - in cm

      • DifferentialPilot

        public DifferentialPilot(MotorProvider motorProvider,
                         EV3PortID leftMotor,
                         EV3PortID rightMotor,
                         SensorProvider sensorProvider,
                         EV3PortID gyroPort,
                         float wheelDiameter,
                         float trackWidth)
        Parameters:
        motorProvider - motorprovider to access synced motor group
        leftMotor - port of left motor
        rightMotor - port of right motor
        sensorProvider - to access gyro sensor
        gyroPort - gyrosensor to support angle correction
        wheelDiameter - in cm
        trackWidth - in cm

      • driveForward

        public void driveForward(int speed)
        Description copied from interface: IDifferentialPilot
        Drives both motors synchronized forward. Method is unblocked.
        Specified by:
        driveForward in interface IDifferentialPilot
        Parameters:
        speed - - speed of the motors [0-1000] deg/sec. Possible MaxSpeed depends on battery power!

      • driveForward

        public void driveForward()
        Description copied from interface: IDifferentialPilot
        Drives both motors synchronized forward. Method is unblocked. Note: Uses the current speed of the motor
        Specified by:
        driveForward in interface IDifferentialPilot

        Specified by:

      • flt

        public void flt()
        Description copied from interface: IDifferentialPilot
        Both motors will be set in flt mode. Motors are synchronized and method is unblocking
        Specified by:

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: IDifferentialPilot
